metadata.synopsis: |COM branch for Laezel interacting with the Zaith'isk. She is convinced the machine is there to cure her and refuses to open her eyes to the reality that it's killing her. The player can intervene and stop it, or let it play out. Eventually, the device explodes and the doctor calls the guards.|
metadata.how_to_trigger: |Interact with the Device dialog after speaking to the doctor.|

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *The device is strange, made of taut flesh and pockmarked metal. It waits for something.*

171.speaker: Lae'zel
171.text: The zaith'isk. Vlaakith's purity, distilled. My duty. My right.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Go ahead, Lae'zel. You've earned it.

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.text: I will not. I gave you my might. You will respect my charge.

188.speaker: Player
188.text: Very well. Step forward and be cleansed.

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: Praise Vlaakith, let it be done.

214.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
214.text: You are infected too, child? Sit, ra'stil. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.

162.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
162.text: You are the infected one, child? Sit, ra'stil. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.

161.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
161.text: Sit, child. Let the zaith'isk end your suffering.
161.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel lays down in the Zaith'isk.Maybe just focus on Laezel and remove the player entirely.

88.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel lays down in the Zaith'isk.Maybe just focus on Laezel and remove the player entirely.

96.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
96.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The 'head' part of the machine descends and the jaws clamp around the Laezel's head, neck, shoulders.

She remains still, calm, accepting of the restraints.

47.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
47.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The 'head' part of the machine descends and the jaws clamp around the Laezel's head, neck, shoulders.

She remains still, calm, accepting of the restraints.

178.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
178.text: You must focus on the parasite at all times. The zaith'isk will do the rest.
178.context: CinematicNodeContext: The doctor fusses, checks everything is set up correctly.NodeContext: Instructive - this is very important

99.text: *An unseen blade cleaves your mind in two. Impossible pain sears your bones and body in concert with Lae'zel's.*
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psychic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' Lae'zel's head to the Zaith'isk.

110.speaker: Narrator
110.text: *An unseen blade cleaves your mind in two. Impossible pain sears your bones and body in concert with Lae'zel's.*
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld between player and Lae'zel. Lae'zel's face suddenly convulses as the machine starts to search through her brain. Player grips their head in excruciating pain.

193.text: *The zaith'isk's psionic forces batter Lae'zel's thoughts. There is no chance she will survive this unscathed.*
193.context:
CinematicNodeContext: |A psionic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' Laezel's head to the Zaith'isk.
Laezel's face is a picture of discomfort. - Reuse |  NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Lae'zel reacts to the initial pain, then chants a meditation phrase, trying to stay calm in the face of the coming agony.

29.text: *The zaith'isk's psionic forces batter Lae'zel's thoughts. There is no chance she will survive this unscathed.*

91.speaker: Lae'zel
91.text: Ngh! Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin!
91.context:
CinematicNodeContext: |A psionic forcefield emerges, 'locking in' Laezel's head to the Zaith'isk.
Laezel's face is a picture of discomfort. - Reuse |  NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Lae'zel reacts to the initial pain, then chants a meditation phrase, trying to stay calm in the face of the coming agony.

64.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
64.text: Yes, child. Speak the Tla'ket. Meditate on its verses.
64.context: NodeContext: teh-LAH-keht. A mantra of sorts.

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *You feel Lae'zel's mind rip and rupture. Is this purification? Is this the cure?*
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Show Laezel turning into a braindead zombie

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Get out of there, Lae'zel. You won't survive this anguish.
79.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

108.speaker: Lae'zel
108.text: No! Vlaakith, purge me of this blight!

121.text: No! Vlaakith, purge me of this blight!

76.speaker: Lae'zel
76.text: No! Vlaakith, purge me of this blight!

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Call on your parasite. Show Lae'zel what she stands to lose.
50.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Extract yourself. Mother Gith would not wish you to suffer.
26.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.text: Mother Gith is sovereign no longer!

152.text: Mother Gith is sovereign no longer!

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.text: Mother Gith is sovereign no longer!

186.speaker: Player
186.text: Plead with the doctor. Lae'zel is in great pain.
186.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

2.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
2.text: The zaith'isk is working as intended.
2.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

31.speaker: Lae'zel
31.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming

213.speaker: Player
213.text: Endure, Lae'zel. The cure is worth the torment.
213.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming/praying to Vlaakith. VLAH-kith mm zah-THOCK, isk-ah-ZAYTH! Abomination to Vlaakith, be purified!

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: The cure! Vlaakith m' zath'ak, isk'a'zaith!
11.context: NodeContext: In great pain, still exclaiming/praying to Vlaakith. VLAH-kith mm zah-THOCK, isk-ah-ZAYTH! Abomination to Vlaakith, be purified!

89.text: *You share in Lae'zel's agony. Every cell within her skull bursts into a constellation of fragments, sorted and reassembled. Lae'zel will die if she remains.*

168.speaker: Narrator
168.text: *You share in Lae'zel's agony. Every cell within her skull bursts into a constellation of fragments, sorted and reassembled. Lae'zel will die if she remains.*
168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld with Lae'zel. Player in absolute agony.

210.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
210.text: Yes, child. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. Call to your queen!
210.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith. Vlaakith's will above all. Spoken with increasing furor.

147.speaker: Astarion
147.text: So... we're just going to stand here and let it kill her? Is that the plan?

70.speaker: Wyll
70.text: That thing's killing her. Do something, damn it!

115.speaker: Gale
115.text: That thing looks set to kill her!

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: Get her away from that thing - now!

72.speaker: Player
72.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*

135.speaker: Narrator
135.text: *Your vision narrows. You sense myriad spectres of githyanki past. This is their fate. This is their anguish.*

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I've seen the truth, Lae'zel. This device doesn't cure - it kills.

190.speaker: Lae'zel
190.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

41.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

123.speaker: Lae'zel
123.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in absolute torture.  lahsh-ah-KLAH! Make me pure!

48.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
48.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

106.speaker: Narrator
106.text: *Your marrow quakes within your bones. Behind the pain, a new sensation rises: power.*
106.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

87.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

182.speaker: Player
182.text: I have seen the truth, Lae'zel. You will be killed, not cured!
182.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

55.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Lies! Vlaakith, my Queen - COMPLETE ME!

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Your tadpole is changing, growing. You have to resist the machine!
122.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

146.speaker: Lae'zel
146.text: I - I - yes. I feel it. Splitting. Burning. NGH!
146.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

170.speaker: Lae'zel
170.text: I - I - yes. I feel it. Splitting. Burning. NGH!
170.context: NodeContext: In great pain but resisting.

107.text: I will not turn from my queen! EXALTED VLAAKITH. I AM RESTORED!

172.speaker: Lae'zel
172.text: I will not turn from my queen! EXALTED VLAAKITH. I AM RESTORED!

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Focus your mind. Try to overload the device.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player squints hard, trying to overload the zaith'isk. The head of the zaith'isk lifts from Lae'zel's.

153.speaker: Narrator
153.text: *Your thoughts weave through the zaith'isk's psionic pathways, turning its own power against it.*
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player squints hard, trying to overload the zaith'isk. The head of the zaith'isk lifts from Lae'zel's.

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *Your thoughts weave through the zaith'isk's psionic pathways, turning its own power against it.*
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player squints hard, trying to overload the zaith'isk. The head of the zaith'isk lifts from Lae'zel's.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel closes her eyes, grits her teeth, extrene extortion all over her face, and leaps from the machine.

195.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel closes her eyes, grits her teeth, extrene extortion all over her face, and leaps from the machine.

128.context: CinematicNodeContext: |We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player and Laezel have been blown aside by the explosion. The mind meld between player and Lae'zel is broken.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: Damn it all, the parasite. I still feel it.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: I AM GITHYANKI. I WILL NOT BE GHAIK!

30.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
30.text: And yet she lives, and so does her parasite.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
1.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
66.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

155.speaker: Narrator
155.text: *Her voice cuts with a fanatical edge - an obsession bordering on mania. If there's a chance the parasite lives, she wants it.*
155.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

148.speaker: Player
148.text: The parasite lives, yes. And thank goodness - it saved her.
148.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

129.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
129.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

111.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
111.text: And it destroyed a zaith'isk... Then its power is even more unique than I thought. I must examine it.
111.context: NodeContext: pondering this as she speaks

201.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
201.text: Since the zaith'isk did not extract it, we must resort to more traditional means.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Your zaith'isk tried to kill Lae'zel. And failed.
8.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

187.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
187.context: NodeContext: pissed off - how dare you accuse her machinery of failing!

132.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
132.text: The only variable in this experience was you - and your parasite. And I will uncover how this happened.
132.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

116.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
116.text: Wait here. I will gather my tools.
116.context: NodeContext: She's lying - she's going to call the guards

169.speaker: Player
169.text: You're wrong. Can't you see it in her eyes? The parasite's dead.
169.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

60.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
60.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.
60.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

22.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
22.text: Really? Then - all this destruction was a symptom of its power... Incredible.

21.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
21.text: I am disappointed that we could not extract it alive. It would have been an exceptional specimen.

23.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
23.text: In any case, the problem is resolved. Leave me. I must salvage what I can.

205.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite's influence has grown. It has changed her, changed you.
205.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

131.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
131.text: You're lying. You're protecting it. I knew it - the parasite's influence has grown. It has changed her, changed you.
131.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

82.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
82.text: We must extract it as soon as possible.
82.context: InternalNodeContext: She's going to call the guards to kill you, but doesn't want to tip you off.

74.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

150.speaker: Narrator
150.text: *There's something in her voice that goes beyond rage - curiosity, perhaps, or regret. Whatever it is, you cannot identify it.*

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: What madness is this? The zaith'isk nearly destroyed me!

164.text: *The device is too powerful. You hold no sway over it.*

142.speaker: Narrator
142.text: *The device is too powerful. You hold no sway over it.*

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Pursue the visions you saw. See where they lead.
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power courses through the player.

118.speaker: Narrator
118.text: *Lae'zel's life is laid bare among those that came before. Her thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Lae'zel's life is laid bare among those that came before. Her thoughts are turned to silver thread and relayed to the Astral Sea.*

126.speaker: Narrator
126.text: *The voices of the dead cry out as one. The zaith'isk collects memories from the infected - and executes them. It is not for curing. It's for killing.*

109.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *The pain is too great. The visions flicker but refuse to come into focus.*

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Draw on the zaith'isk's power, take it as your own.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power courses through the player.

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *The many planes of existence stretch before you, then coalesce. You are gifted, you are cursed.*
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power courses through the player.

69.speaker: Narrator
69.text: *The many planes of existence stretch before you, then coalesce. You are gifted, you are cursed.*
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Power courses through the player.

179.text: *The zaith'isk overwhelms the both of you. The weight of the astral sea crushes your mind and spirit.*

94.speaker: Narrator
94.text: *The zaith'isk overwhelms the both of you. The weight of the astral sea crushes your mind and spirit.*

137.speaker: Player
137.text: Embrace the pain, Lae'zel. Be pure.
137.context: NodeContext: In the greatest agony yet.

59.speaker: Player
59.context: NodeContext: In the greatest agony yet.

75.speaker: Lae'zel
75.context: NodeContext: In the greatest agony yet.

204.context: CinematicNodeContext: |We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player and Laezel have been blown aside by the explosion. The mind meld between player and Lae'zel is broken.

139.context: CinematicNodeContext: |We see the forcefield recede, then expand out suddenly. In a burst of bright light, the Zaith'isk explodes. The player and Laezel have been blown aside by the explosion. The mind meld between player and Lae'zel is broken.

149.speaker: Player
149.text: Seek answers within the zaith'isk. What is this vision?
149.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: You must listen! The device is changing you. You are becoming illithid.
112.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

85.speaker: Lae'zel
85.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

157.text: I feel it. Skin stretching. Mind failing. NGH!
157.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: I feel it. Skin stretching. Mind failing. NGH!
34.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel in great pain but pushing through.

143.speaker: Player
143.text: Keep focused, Lae'zel. The cure is close.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Brace your mind, Lae'zel.Vlaakith tavki na'zin. Vlaakith tavki na'zin...

51.speaker: Player
51.text: You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance. I will be cured first.
51.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

102.speaker: Lae'zel
102.text: You walk the line between confident and arrogant. A beguiling turn of events.

104.speaker: Lae'zel
104.text: You walk the line between confident and arrogant. A beguiling turn of events.

163.text: I hear you and I deny you. Your turn will come.

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: I hear you and I deny you. Your turn will come.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: Out of my way. Or would you rather I split you in two and walk through the centre?
145.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: I do so enjoy when you choose boldness over blandness.

165.speaker: Lae'zel
165.text: I do so enjoy when you choose boldness over blandness.

13.text: I'm in no mood to exchange threats. I will enter first; your time will come.

196.speaker: Lae'zel
196.text: I'm in no mood to exchange threats. I will enter first; your time will come.

97.speaker: Player
97.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

202.speaker: Lae'zel
202.text: A persuasive argument, if not the most eloquent.

154.speaker: Lae'zel
154.text: A persuasive argument, if not the most eloquent.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: Go on, into the zaith'isk. I will follow.

173.text: I'm not swayed by your little parlour trick. I will be cleansed; then you may follow.

183.speaker: Lae'zel
183.text: I'm not swayed by your little parlour trick. I will be cleansed; then you may follow.

176.speaker: Player
176.text: You would still be hunting for this place without my guidance. I will be cured first.
176.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Make way, Lae'zel. I am purging myself of this damned parasite.
20.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

133.speaker: Lae'zel
133.text: Tsk'va - contempt for power, contempt for allegiance. I am done with you.
133.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

134.speaker: Player
134.text: All right, all right. Go ahead.
134.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

125.speaker: Player
125.text: And I'm done with you. Good riddance.
125.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

83.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
83.text: Ghustil, assist me. This one is Hshar'lak!
83.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

174.speaker: Lae'zel
174.text: Ghustil, assist me. The istik has turned against me!
174.context: NodeContext: Pissed at player for not letting her go first into the purifier. tsk-VA! = SHIT!

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *The device is an ingenious synthesis of illithid anatomy and metal alloys. It hums with psionic energy, hinting at paths into unknown minds and unseen planes.*

62.speaker: Narrator
62.text: *The device is an ingenious synthesis of illithid anatomy and metal alloys. It hums with psionic energy, hinting at paths into unknown minds and unseen planes.*

197.speaker: Lae'zel
197.text: Stand aside. My time has come.

184.text: *The device is part organic, part synthetic. But you can't tell how it was made, or how it works.*

113.speaker: Narrator
113.text: *The device is part organic, part synthetic. But you can't tell how it was made, or how it works.*

95.speaker: Narrator
95.text: *The ruined device stands inert, chilling the air around it.*

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: Purification is my right. I AM GITHYANKI. I WILL NOT BE GHAIK!

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Take heart. We'll find a way.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: Do not patronise me. Purity is Vlaakith's promise. This was the way.

200.speaker: Player
200.text: Calm down. You're not the only one infected, you know.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: I am the only one denied my claim.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: I have done Vlaakith's will. I will be rewarded. I must.

138.speaker: Player
138.text: Control your tongue, before I slice it out.
138.context: NodeContext: Worked up for a moment before reasliing the player is trying to get her to calm down

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.context: NodeContext: Worked up for a moment before reasliing the player is trying to get her to calm down

211.speaker: Lae'zel
211.text: Chk. Consider your point made. Uncontrolled fury is the true warrior's bane.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Our duty to Vlaakith remains. Control your emotion, let our queen be our focus.
73.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het. Only in Vlaakith may we find light. Lae'zel calming down some.

209.speaker: Lae'zel
209.text: I hear wisdom in your words. Vlaakith'ka sivim hrath krash'ht.
209.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het. Only in Vlaakith may we find light. Lae'zel calming down some.

100.speaker: Lae'zel
100.text: Let this be a beginning, not an end.

175.speaker: Lae'zel
175.text: Yes. This is what I was taught. Vlaakith'ka sivim... no. The chant rings hollow.
175.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im. Lae'zel questioning, and stopping her prayer/chant

160.speaker: Lae'zel
160.text: I must meditate. There is much to think on.
